item.title: Today's Prayer
item.description: May 23, 2023 Today's Verse Jeremiah 23:23–24 [23] “Am I a God at hand, declares the LORD, and not a God far away? [24] Can a man hide himself in secret places so that I cannot see him? declares the LORD. Do I not fill heaven and earth? declares the LORD. Today's Memory Verse 1 John 4:7-8 - Beloved, let us love one another, for love is from God, and whoever loves has been born of God and knows God.
